tagline.title: BALI BEACH TOUR IS TO ENJOY THE FAMOUS WHITE SAND BEACH IN BALI ISLAND WITH PROFESSIONAL BALI TOURS DRIVER
tagline.text: BALI BEACH TOUR IS TO ENJOY THE FAMOUS WHITE SAND BEACH IN BALI ISLAND WITH PROFESSIONAL BALI TOURS DRIVER
tagline.html: BALI BEACH TOUR IS TO ENJOY THE FAMOUS WHITE SAND BEACH IN BALI ISLAND WITH PROFESSIONAL BALI TOURS DRIVER

description.text: Bali Beach Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Packages to Visit some of the famous and beautiful white sand beach in Bali Islands. Is a half day tour to visit the beach with its beautiful white sand and clear water, a tour that may be specifically for those of you who really like to travel to the beach whether it's for swimming, sunbathing or just enjoying the beach view with a gentle beach breeze will make the sensation become very comfortable. The first thing we will visit is Kuta Beach which is famous for its white sand and clear water and also with all the beach activities here which are very tempting, proceed to dreamland beach to see the beauty of the beach which has always been a dream of surfers, where on the beach The waves are very big and suitable for surfers who want to do attractions with their surfboards, and proceed to Pandawa Beach to enjoy the beautiful beach with white sand that stretches along the beach, perfect for those of you who want to swim here or just sunbathe. Continue to go to the restaurant to enjoy very delicious Indonesian food, after lunch we will take you back to the hotel by bringing a very impressive experience on this beach tour, the tour will also be more enjoyable with the hospitality of our tour driver who will always make the atmosphere becomes lively, so it will make you comfortable during the Bali Beach Tour

image.title: Bali Beach Tour | Kuta Beach | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kuta Beach is always in the hearts of tourists, with a beach that is better known by tourists, located in the city center with all the activities around it such as shopping malls, star hotels and famous restaurants with views of Kuta beach. This beach has many activities carried out by tourists here, such as sunbathing on the beach, where many tents are rented out for those of you who want to enjoy the sun on Kuta beach, swimming activities with clear water are perfect for wetting your body with sea water, and also swimming in clear water. here there are many surfers to enjoy the challenges of the waves of the Kuta beach, here there are also surf lessons on the beach offering services to learn to surf

title.title: Dream Land Beach | Bali Beach Tour

image.title: Bali Beach Tour | Dream Land Beach | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Dream Land Beach is one of the most beautiful beaches in Bali. It is located in the Southern Peninsula of Bali, Dream land beach has always been the dream of beach lovers, because with the stretch of white sand that stretches along the beach, the view from afar is so beautiful, from the past this beach has always been crowded by visitors who want to see the beauty of the beach which is often used for swimming, sunbathing. and also surf here. Here the waves are so big that it becomes a dream place for surfers who want to feel the sensation of doing freestyle on this dreamland beach. With the enchanting beauty of this beach, it deserves to be called the Dream Land Beach, because as the name implies, this beach is a dream beach for beach lovers.

button.title: Dream Land Beach | Bali Beach Tour

image.title: Bali Beach Tour | Pandawa Beach | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Pandawa Beach is a beach that since its introduction has become a prima donna for tourists to enjoy a stretch of white sand that is so beautiful, with clear water that is perfect for swimming here, and many tents for rent for those of you who want to sunbathe and enjoy the hot sun on the island of Bali. This beach was formerly called secret beach because access to this beach is very difficult because you have to go through steep rocks, since it is known by tourists, access to the beach is made easier by making a direct road to the beach. With the ornaments of the Panca Pandawa statue on this beach, it makes the impression more beautiful, you can take pictures with this charming beach background or swim here

With the ornaments of the Panca Pandawa statue on this beach, it makes the impression more beautiful, you can take pictures with this charming beach background or swim here

price.title: Bali Beach Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Beach Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Bali Beach Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,150,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 450,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
